QuestionJSON.Question:
Harley aspires to be a gymnast. To monitor their progress, they decided to create a program that breaks down their training routine into smaller tasks. Harley's daily routine includes warm-up, skill training, strength and conditioning, and cool down. Each task begins only after the previous one is completed. Depending on their daily performance, Harley changes their strength and conditioning duration. What does the following program output if Harley performed exceedingly well today?

1integer performance = 8
2integer strengthDuration = 40
3
4// program proceeds to the next task only after the previous one is complete
5output "Warm-up: 20 minutes"
6output "Skill Training: 50 minutes"
7
8// If Harley performs really well, increase strength and conditioning duration
9if performance > 7
10
strengthDuration = strengthDuration + 20
11end
12
13output "Strength and Conditioning: " + strengthDuration + " minutes"
14output "Cool down: 15 minutes"
QuestionJSON.Answer1:
Warm-up: 20 minutes
Skill Training: 50 minutes
Strength and Conditioning: 40 minutes
Cool down: 15 minutes
QuestionJSON.Answer2:
Warm-up: 20 minutes
Skill Training: 50 minutes
Strength and Conditioning: 60 minutes
Cool down: 15 minutes
QuestionJSON.Answer3:
Warm-up: 20 minutes
Skill Training: 50 minutes
Strength and Conditioning: 30 minutes
Cool down: 15 minutes
QuestionJSON.Answer4:
Warm-up: 20 minutes
Skill Training: 50 minutes
Strength and Conditioning: 30 minutes
Cool down: 10 minutes
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Harley's training plan has a built-in conditional. If their performance was exceedingly well today, the strength and conditioning phase duration is increased by 20 minutes, making the total strength and conditioning time 60 minutes.
